General.Name: Risesun Real Estate Development Co Ltd
General.Description: RiseSun Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd engages in development and sale of real estate properties in China. The company develops commercial, urban housing, tourism real estate, health care properties, and industrial parks. It also offers real estate funds and commercial banking services; and operates hotels. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Langfang, China.

4.Name: Mr. Qiang  Wang
4.Title: Member of Supervisory Board & Deputy GM of Risk Control Center
